feed.title: Go Kamoda
feed.subtitle: Go Kamoda's profile page. Ph.D. Student at SOKENDAI/NINJAL researching computational linguistics and natural language processing.

entry.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the IJCNLP-AACL 2025

link.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the IJCNLP-AACL 2025

entry.content:
We are pleased to announce that our paper has been accepted to the 8th BlackboxNLP Workshop.

  • Sasaki, M., Kamoda, G., Takahashi, R., Sato, K., Heinzerling, B., Sakaguchi, K., & Inui, K. (2025).
    Can Language Models Handle a Non-Gregorian Calendar?.
    In Proceedings of the 14th International Joint Conference on Natural Language Processing and the 4th Conference of the Asia-Pacific Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics (IJCNLP-AACL 2025).
    arXiv

-> Publications
entry.summary: "Can Language Models Handle a Non-Gregorian Calendar?"

entry.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the 8th BlackboxNLP Workshop

link.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the 8th BlackboxNLP Workshop

entry.content:
We are pleased to announce that our paper has been accepted to the 8th BlackboxNLP Workshop.

  • Takahashi, R., Kamoda, G., Heinzerling, B., Sakaguchi, K., & Inui, K. (2025).
    Understanding the Side Effects of Rank-One Knowledge Editing.
    In BlackboxNLP 2025: The 8th Workshop on Analyzing and Interpreting Neural Networks for NLP.
    ACL Anthology   arXiv

-> Publications
entry.summary: "Understanding the Side Effects of Rank-One Knowledge Editing"

entry.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the Findings of EMNLP 2025

link.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the Findings of EMNLP 2025

entry.content:
We are pleased to announce that our paper has been accepted to the Findings of EMNLP 2025.

  • Inaba, T., Kamoda, G., Inui, K., Isonuma, M., Miyao, Y., Oseki, Y., Takagi, Y., & Heinzerling, B. (2025).
    How a Bilingual LM Becomes Bilingual: Tracing Internal Representations with Sparse Autoencoders.
    In Findings of the Association for Computational Linguistics: EMNLP 2025.

entry.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the ICLR 2025

link.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the ICLR 2025

entry.content:
We are pleased to announce that our paper has been accepted to ICLR 2025.

  • Deguchi, H., Kamoda, G., Matsushita, Y., Taguchi, C., Waga, M., Suenaga, K., & Yokoi, S. (2025).
    SoftMatcha: A Soft and Fast Pattern Matcher for Billion-Scale Corpus Searches.
    In The Thirteenth International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR 2025).
    OpenReview   arXiv   Project Page

-> Publications
entry.summary: "SoftMatcha: A Soft and Fast Pattern Matcher for Billion-Scale Corpus Searches"

entry.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the COLING 2025

link.title: âœ… Paper accepted to the COLING 2025

entry.content:
We are pleased to announce that our paper has been accepted to COLING 2025.

  • Kamoda, G., Asai, A., Brassard, A., & Sakaguchi, K. (2025).
    Quantifying the Influence of Evaluation Aspects on Long-Form Response Assessment.
    In Proceedings of the 31st International Conference on Computational Linguistics (COLING 2025).
    ACL Anthology   GitHub

-> Publications
entry.summary: "Quantifying the Influence of Evaluation Aspects on Long-Form Response Assessment"
